title: Beach Cleanup Day
description: Join us for a day of cleaning up the shoreline. Help protect marine life and keep our beaches beautiful!
requirements: Bring gloves and water. Trash bags will be provided.

title: Food Bank Sorting Volunteer Day
description: Help sort and organize food donations at the local food bank to support families in need.
requirements: Must be able to stand for extended periods and lift up to 20 pounds.

title: After-School Math Tutoring
description: Volunteer to help elementary school students with math homework and concepts.
requirements: Experience with elementary math education preferred.

title: Senior Center Game Day
description: Spend time with seniors playing board games and card games. Brighten someone's day!
requirements: Patience and a friendly attitude required.

title: Animal Shelter Dog Walking
description: Help exercise shelter dogs by taking them for walks and providing companionship.
requirements: Comfortable with handling dogs of various sizes and temperaments.

title: Spring Community Garden Planting
description: Help plant seedlings and prepare beds for the spring growing season in our community garden.
requirements: Bring gardening gloves and sun protection. Tools provided.

title: Homeless Shelter Dinner Service
description: Prepare and serve dinner to residents at the local homeless shelter.
requirements: Food handler's certificate preferred but not required.

title: Spring Community Health Fair
description: Volunteer at booths providing health information and basic health checks to community members.
requirements: Healthcare background helpful but not necessary for all positions.

title: City Park Restoration Project
description: Help restore our city park by planting native trees and shrubs to improve habitat for local wildlife.
requirements: Bring work gloves and wear sturdy shoes. Tools and plants provided.

title: Children's Library Reading Hour
description: Read stories to children ages 4-8 at the public library's weekly reading hour.
requirements: Enthusiasm for children's literature and comfort speaking in front of small groups.

title: Community Disaster Preparedness Workshop
description: Help facilitate a workshop teaching community members how to prepare for natural disasters.
requirements: Previous disaster response or emergency training helpful but not required.

title: Community Blood Drive Assistant
description: Support the Red Cross team by registering donors and providing post-donation refreshments.
requirements: Friendly demeanor and ability to follow health protocols.

title: Habitat for Humanity Home Build
description: Help build affordable housing for families in need. All skill levels welcome!
requirements: Closed-toe shoes required. Training provided on site.

title: Youth Soccer Volunteer Coach
description: Coach children ages 6-8 in basic soccer skills for the spring recreation league.
requirements: Basic understanding of soccer and enthusiasm for working with children.

title: River Cleanup Kayak Expedition
description: Paddle the river in kayaks to collect trash from hard-to-reach areas of our waterway.
location: River Access Point at Willow Park
requirements: Must be comfortable in a kayak. Kayaks provided, but bring water shoes and sun protection.

title: Senior Tech Support Workshop
description: Help senior citizens learn to use smartphones, tablets, and computers.
requirements: Patience and basic knowledge of common devices and applications.

title: Animal Shelter Fundraising Bake Sale
description: Staff a bake sale table to raise funds for the local animal shelter's new medical equipment.
requirements: Friendly attitude and basic math skills for handling sales.

title: Winter Clothing Drive Sorting
description: Sort and organize donated winter clothing for distribution to homeless shelters.
requirements: Ability to stand for 2+ hours and sort items by size/type.

title: Children's Hospital Visitor Program
description: Bring cheer to children in long-term hospital care through games and activities.
requirements: Background check required. Creative and positive attitude essential.

title: Downtown Community Mural Painting
description: Help paint a community mural designed by local artists to beautify the downtown area.
requirements: No artistic experience necessary! Wear clothes that can get paint on them.
